message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,500 is too low. Could you do $13,500?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
